flawed_nl_solution:
His new deadlift is 300*2.5+100=<<300*2.5+100=850>>850 pounds
So he added 850-300=<<850-300=555>>555 pounds to his deadlift
This took 18-13=<<18-13=5>>5 years
So he added 555/5=<<555/5=111>>111 pounds per year
#### 111

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 550, not 555. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
